analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#482-495):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#492-494)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#495)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#317-399):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#329-334)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#337-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#376-377)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#376)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#317-399):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#329-334)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#337-341)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#377-381)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#380-381)

CrowdsaleExt.investInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- crowdsale.updateEarlyParicipantWhitelist(msg.sender,this,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#394-396)

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- time > crowdsale.startsAt() (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#618)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#274-308):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#287-288)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#297)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#306-308)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#308)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#305-306)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#289-291)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#294)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#317-399):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#329-334)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#337-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#369-372)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#368-369)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#372-374)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#410-426):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#412-413)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#419-420)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#420-422)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#419)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#417-419)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#686-710) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#699-710)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#697-710)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#194-195)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#8-9)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#182)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/42/0xb4bba71e32c3628f0896639da4c5364519a8ca08.sol#183)
